message:
feat: add friend system UI

- Add FriendsView component with 3 tabs (My Friends, Requests, Add Friend)
- Implement friend list, request management, and invite code system
- Add friend system API functions to voiceApi.ts
- Update TopNavBar with Friends navigation button
- Add i18n translations for friend system (English + Chinese)
- Integrate FriendsView into App.tsx routing
